column1: Smoque BBQ////I think Smoque's rating here on Yelp speaks for itself. The place is not much to look at from the outside or the inside
column2: but the food is out-of-this-world good. If you're a vegetarian
column3: I'm not sure this place is for you
column4: but if you're like most other people and you like meat - oh man
column5: it's heaven. The food is simple
column6: it's prepared quickly and IT'S SO GOOD. If I lived closer
column7: I'm not sure I would be able to stop myself from coming back everyday.
